Service Pricing

zXc Provides Transparent and Simple Pricing

Transport Service NRC MRC
Dark Fiber
Dark Fiber Pair Lease (Zone 1) $2,500 $750
Dark Fiber Pair Lease (Zone 2) $2,500 $1,000
Dark Fiber Pair Lease (Zone 3) $2,500 $1,200
Dark Fiber Pair Lease (Zone 1 to 2) $2,500 $1,250
Dark Fiber Pair Lease (Zone 1 to 3) $2,500 $1,750
Dark Fiber Pair Lease (Zone 2 to 3) $2,500 $1,400
Ethernet
1 Gig Private Ethernet (Any Zone) $2,500 $1,000
10 Gig Private Ethernet (Any Zone) $2,500 $1,200
100 Gig Private Ethernet (Any Zone) $15,000 $12,000
ZxC waives the NRC for customers agreeing to a 12 month term.

Additional Location Pricing

Certain data center have an additional Location MRC to cover zXc port charges.

Location MRC
60 Hudson, Telx $350
111 8th Avenue, Telx $350
375 Pearl Street, Sabey $50
100 Delawanna Ave, Telx $300
2 Peekay Dr, Telx $300
